vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.15.18; also called Aziel at 1Ch.15.20;
Also named: a.zi.el (עֲזִיאֵל "Aziel" H5815)
§ Jaaziel = "made bold by God"
one of the Levites appointed by David to perform the musical service before the ark
vocabInfos._es_Definition: levita; en tiempos del rey David
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
雅薛 这个陽性專有名詞在希伯來文的意思是 "因神而無懼"
被大衛指派在約櫃前奏樂事奉的一位利未人 (代上 15:18)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
雅薛 这个阳性专有名词在希伯来文的意思是 "因神而无惧"
被大卫指派在约柜前奏乐事奉的一位利未人 (代上 15:18)
